title: Unable to load resources from Android
body:
### Description

I have a few bitmaps in the images folder and also some fonts. When I try to retrieve them, I get an exception. I checked the file with File.Exist a function for the file, but I could not find the file name. I am trying to draw a graph with an angle and radius having the same value. In this application, I have reduced the radius.  It works fine with Windows. 

### Code

[Cyclone.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/12542816/Cyclone.zip)


### Expected Behavior

It should find all the resources. 

### Actual Behavior

Always exception

### Version of SkiaSharp

2.88.3 (Current)

### Last Known Good Version of SkiaSharp

2.88.2 (Previous)

### IDE / Editor

Visual Studio (Windows)

### Platform / Operating System

Android

### Platform / Operating System Version

Emulator, I have not tested on Apple.

comments.body:
This is not error of skiasharp, Maui deal with Resources as native resource, every platform is different
On Android, native resources see https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/xamarin/android/app-fundamentals/resources-in-android/?tabs=windows
- Maui's Resources/Raw as Android's Asserts
- Maui's Resources/Images as Android's Resource/drawable

So, if you want read image in Resources/Images
see https://stackoverflow.com/questions/6301493/get-path-of-android-resource

I advice you use Resources/Raw
